text: If you love the mountains, you will love this spacious home with absolutely everything you need for your Montana homestead! With no HOA/CCR's, bring your horses, livestock, pets, and plans! Upstairs, you'll find a retreat complete with a jacuzzi tub, a walk-in closet, and bonus space for an office, library, or additional bedroom. The daylight basement provides another bedroom, bonus space, and a pellet stove to create an area that can be used comfortably for projects, media room, home office, or guests. Step out onto the wraparound deck, and you'll look over a secure gardening space, open yard, livestock barn, chicken coop, and best of all, a large updated heated shop with store room, wood shop, and even more developed space for storage or outside office. In addition to all the custom updates and improvements, the home has a new roof and new siding in 2023. You'll never have cabin fever with so much enjoyable and beautiful space to utilize inside and out with extensive valley and river views. text: Luxury Mountain Home on 16.54 Acres in the Little Rocky Mountains Nestled in the private Square Butte Subdivision, this exceptional 2-bedroom, 2.5-bath, 3, 000+/- sq. ft. home offers the perfect blend of rustic charm and modern amenities. Built in 2012, the home was designed with privacy in mind, surrounded by beautiful, untouched land. The owners cleared trees thoughtfully, ensuring the home remains hidden from view, while offering spectacular, unobstructed views of Thornhill Butte. The property includes two lots totaling 16.54 acres, with the second lot undeveloped, offering the potential for resale if desired. Crafted using SIPS panel construction, the home exudes warmth with natural edge lumber on both the interior and exterior. The wood flooring, salvaged from a 1935 grain elevator, adds a historic touch, polished to perfection. The custom kitchen features an antique enamel sink, refurbished gas range, and a striking solid slab wood counter bar. Vaulted ceilings and Blue Pine accents enhance the home's open-concept living areas, creating a welcoming space that combines modern design with timeless character. The main floor master suite is a true retreat, featuring a large jetted tub, an infrared sauna, and a hot tub just outside, perfect for enjoying early mornings or quiet evenings. A spacious walk-in pantry and a laundry area, included with a guest half bath, complete the main floor. Upstairs, the lofted area includes an office, a non-conforming room, a full bath, and a large rec room, offering endless possibilities to add more bedrooms or create your ideal living space. This property is designed for both comfort and convenience. The attached 2-car garage, with 13-foot ceilings and ample storage, and the 30' x 40' detached shop, heated and insulated, provide plenty of space for hobbies, work, and storage. The shop is even plumbed for a bathroom. Additionally, the property is set up for off-grid power if needed, wired to run on a generator. Outside, the land provides abundant recreational opportunities with access to BLM land for hiking, hunting, and exploring. Wildlife, including deer, turkey, and mountain sheep, frequent the property. The owners have also created fenced areas for a garden, chicken coop, and additional storage. Two storage sheds with log siding and a metal roof add to the property's charm. Conveniently located, the property is just 60 miles from Malta, where you'll find groceries, schools, and other amenities. Zortman, a nearby town, is 20 minutes away, and the Missouri River Breaks and James Kipp Recreation Area are just a short drive. Billings, with the closest commercial airport, is about 160 miles away. Property taxes for 2024 were $2, 468, and the home is serviced by a private well and septic system, with the well providing 25 gallons per minute at a depth of 130 feet. This mountain retreat offers a unique opportunity to experience peace, privacy, and outdoor adventure. Don't miss your chance to make this exceptional property your new home.

text: Emerald Lake is a serene lake known for its calm waters, striking emerald hue, and abundant generously sized troutwith no invasive fish species. Also known as 'Tote Lake, ' the community is gated and the lake is tucked away on over 30 private acres, just 50 minutes from Missoula and 15 minutes from Seeley Lake.
